question: Which of the following actions is performed by debenture trustee in case of delayed payment?
option1: Update the calendar specifying the date of such payment
answer: Update the calendar specifying the date of such payment
explanation: Status of payment against such issuers will have to be disclosed not later than one day from the due date. In case the payment is made with a delay by the issuer, DTs should update the calendar specifying the date of such payment, with a remark ‘delayed payment’.
